title: 21 Scary Stories to Fall Asleep To | 3 Hours with Rain Ambience
description:
Drift off into darkness with hours of true creepy stories that will send chills down your spine—just enough to lull you into sleep. These real-life horror stories feature unsettling encounters, paranormal activity, late-night stalkers, and disturbing mysteries told in a calm, immersive voice designed for late-night listening. Whether you're winding down or love sleeping to eerie ambience, this collection is perfect for fans of true scary stories, creepypasta, and sleep horror podcasts.

🕯️ New stories added weekly
🎧 Best with headphones
🌙 Ideal for night owls, insomniacs, and horror lovers


Check out the PODCAST! ►
